title: Emerging markets… “sticky” investments… and the trillion-dollar opportunity every investor should be watching (Ep. 656)
itunes:title: Emerging markets… “sticky” investments… and the trillion-dollar opportunity every investor should be watching
description: We’re about to make history… In just a few days I’m launching my industry’s first-ever digital security: the Curzio Equity Owners (CEO) token. On today’s show I break down all the details around my offer. I also explain why digital securities are a multitrillion-dollar opportunity… and why you absolutely must educate yourself on this incredible market—even if you’re not investing in this particular deal. I welcome back good friend—and regular guest—Andrew Horowitz of Horowitz and Company. Andrew is an excellent technical analyst and trend follower. We discuss everything from last December’s selloff to January’s incredible rebound… emerging markets… macro trends… “sticky” investments (think cigarettes, alcohol, and social media)... the Federal Reserve… and more. Andrew also shares a couple key items he’s watching to drive the markets going forward.
